description: Development of professional clinical skills in the general dental practice environment of clinics such as the regional government dental clinics, Community Controlled Health Services and Oral Health Centre clinics. Students will be rotated through several clinics & will be expected to provide comprehensive oral health care to allocated patients. Each week, students will typically have 21hr of clinical work and 3hr of observation/assisting. Hours and arrangements will vary according to external placement operations. This course operates over an extended semester in order to provide 22 weeks of clinical practice.
